titles: The Contented couckould, or, A Pleasant new songe of a New-castle man whose wife being gon from him, shewing how he came to London to her, & when he found her, carried her backe againe to New- castle towne : to a very pleasant new tune.
notes: Broadside, printed as single sheet, cut and cropped.
Right half of sheet contains "The second part. To the same tune," and imprint.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
